title.rendered: Aria Group has signed with Yechan of K-Pop Group, OMEGA-X to mange Overseas Acting and Music Endeavors

content.rendered:
Shin Yechan – Aria Group

Aria Group Teams Up with K-Pop Group OMEGA-X’s Yechan Shin for Global Acting and Music Ventures after Hit Acting Debut

SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA, July 12, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — Aria Group and IPQ Inc. (Formerly Picturesque) are thrilled to announce their partnership in managing the talented artist, Yechan Shin from OMEGA-X, for his acting and music activities beyond South Korea’s borders. This collaboration marks an exciting milestone in expanding Yechan’s artistic reach and international presence.

Aria Group, known for its exceptional expertise in artist management and international promotions, joins forces with IPQ Inc., a Multi-Cultural IP Creators company with a strong track record in nurturing and supporting emerging talents. Together, they aim to provide Yechan with comprehensive guidance and opportunities in overseas markets, fostering his growth as a multifaceted entertainer.

Yechan, a member of the sensational K-pop group OMEGA-X, has captivated audiences with his exceptional vocals, dynamic stage presence, and remarkable acting skills. Building on his success in South Korea, this collaboration opens doors for Yechan to explore new horizons and showcase his talent on a global scale.

Aria Group and IPQ Inc. share a common vision to propel Yechan’s career by strategically navigating the international entertainment landscape. Leveraging their networks, industry insights, and years of experience, the collaboration aims to secure acting and music opportunities for Yechan, ensuring his artistic potential resonates with diverse audiences worldwide.

The partnership between Aria Group and IPQ Inc. symbolizes their unwavering commitment to supporting emerging artists and fostering their creative journeys. Both companies are excited to embark on this venture, confident that their combined efforts will lead to great accomplishments for Yechan and solidify his standing as a rising star in the global entertainment industry.

For further inquiries, please contact:

Aria Group Media Relations

Email: contact@ariagroup.co.kr

IPQ Entertainment Media Relations

Email: kmy@ipqcorp.com

###

About Aria Group:

Aria Group is a prominent artist management and international promotions company dedicated to nurturing and promoting exceptional talent. With a diverse roster of artists, Aria Group has successfully guided numerous careers to international recognition.

About IPQ Inc. (Picturesque:)

IPQ Inc. is a leading Multi-Cultural IP Creators company specializing in artist development, management, and global promotions. Their passion for discovering and supporting emerging talents has earned them a reputation as a trusted partner in the entertainment industry.

About OMEGA-X:

OMEGA-X is a groundbreaking K-pop group known for their powerful performances and extraordinary musicality. Comprising a talented lineup of artists, OMEGA-X continues to make waves in the music industry with their unique style and innovative sound.

Junwoo Yoon
Aria Group LLC
email us here
Visit us on social media:
Twitter
LinkedIn
Instagram

You just read:

News Provided By

July 12, 2023, 09:43 GMT
